Instead of using literals in the program (\n \r), use the
System.getPropert=
y("line.separator") and test against that if you need
to test it.  Using th=
is and others in the code (i.e.
getProperty("file.separator") or File.SEPAR=
ATOR, etc.) will greatly
reduce the need to "port" to other OS's.

-jason
